---
title: "Diamonds Ex"
format: html
---

```{r setup}
#| include: false
#| message: false
library("tidyverse")
library("ggdensity")
```

```{r}
#| fig-height: 20
#| fig-width: 8
ggplot(diamonds, aes(x = carat, y = price)) + 
  geom_hdr_points() +
  facet_wrap(vars(clarity), ncol = 1) +
  theme_bw() +
  scale_y_continuous(transform = scales::transform_log10()) +
  labs(
    title = "Diamond Prices by Clarity Ratings",
    subtitle = str_glue("Rendered on {Sys.time()}"),
    x = "Size (carat)",
    y = "Price ($)",
    color = NULL
  )
```
